original_text: He said, ‘Go back to your homes with the valuable things that you took from your enemies. Take many animals with you. Take silver, gold, bronze and iron things, as well as beautiful clothes. Share these things with the other people of your tribes.’
korean_text: 말하여 이르되 너희는 많은 재산과 심히 많은 가축과 은과 금과 구리와 쇠와 심히 많은 의복을 가지고 너희의 장막으로 돌아가서 너희의 원수들에게서 탈취한 것을 너희의 형제와 나눌지니라 하매

sentences.original_text: with the valuable things that you took from your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 적에게서 빼앗은 귀중한 것들을 가지고

sentences.original_text: Take silver, gold, bronze and iron things
sentences.korean_translation: 은, 금, 놋, 쇠 물건들을 가져가라

sentences.original_text: Share these things with the other people of your tribes
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들을 너희 지파의 다른 사람들과 나누어라
